projects.project_name: Earth road project in Mroum commune

ProjectSummary.Objective: At the end of 2009, people in all villages have good road for traveling

Evironmental_Safeguard.Impact: This project required environment study.New road project

Highland_Safeguard.Reason: There is no high land people living in this commune
